title: Titicaca Islands 2D/1N

itinerary.day: Day 01: Uros and Taquile with Overnight

activities.text: Reception at the bus terminal or airport. Transfer to the port. Boat ride on Lake Titicaca to visit the floating Uros Islands. Continue to Taquile Island. Guided walk and typical lunch. Overnight in a local family home (homestay) or return to Puno depending on the selected option.
Typical breakfast on the island or at the hotel. Free time to take photos or interact with the community. Return by boat to Puno. Transfer to the airport or bus terminal. End of the tour.

includes: 01 night of accommodation in Puno or homestay in Taquile
Tour to Uros and Taquile Islands
Shared or private boat service depending on the package
